channel.title: Residence container flag
channel.description:
does not cover chests in minecarts. I haven't tested furnaces but I'm pretty sure I will be met with same results.
Oh and while you're at it, please enable admin flag for normal players. I would love to be able to give my friends the right to hand over rights as they see fit.

item.title: Residence container flag
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

Mopar probably disabled the admin flag to discourage people from making multiple accounts to create multiple residences.

To get around this, she would need to login to all of her accounts to manually grant rights and renew the leases - increasing the chance of getting caught.

Read full topic
